Room.Name: Edge of the Pond
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the edge of a pond in the enchanted forest.
Room.LongDescription: The pond covers a large area to the east, where you see a thick forest of trees on the other side. On the north side of the pond you see a large cottage and waterwheel. Smoke rises from the cottage's chimney. Directly north is a jumble of rocks and boulders and a rockface. the path continues to the north through the rocks, and south through a swampy looking area.
